name: Harhar
tagline: Humble Avalanche Replayer of HTTP Archives
body:
This tool allows you to generate a HTTP Archive (.har) file using your browser, and replay the content at high volumes using [Spirent Avalanche](http://www.spirent.com/go/avalanche). The program has been tested and works on Windows and Linux (through Mono).

Spirent Communications is a leader in Test & Measurement tools. The author of this tool is Arnaud Castaner, an employee of Spirent. Spirent Communications is not involved in the development of this software and cannot be led liable for anything related to Harhar.

The author would like to acknowledge that this tool uses the Newtonsoft.JSON (MIT), the Noda Time (Apache 2.0) and HarNet (LGPL-3) libraries.
